text: balki agar tum saabit qadam raho aur (rasool kee mukhaalefat se) bacho aur kuphfaar apane (josh mein) tumapar chadh bhee aaye to tumhaara paravaradigaar aise poch hazaar farishton se tumhaaree madad karega jo nishaane jang lagae hue date honge aur khuda ne ye madad sirph tumhaaree khushee ke lie kee hai
